attributes.action: Promote all efforts to free Tibet from Chinese rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Government has a history for cowardice in the promotion of a free Tibet. This government should immediately place an embargo on all Chinese produce and trade links in order to put pressure on that country and blackmail it to free Tibet from its rule, which has a history of violence, disrespect and greed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
